head.title: Beyond Interactive Buys a London Firm

hedline.hl1: Beyond Interactive Buys a London Firm

abstract.p: Beyond Interactive in Ann Arbor, Mich, part of Grey Advertising, is acquiring its first agency in Europe, Media 21 in London; financial terms undisclosed (S)

block.p: Beyond Interactive in Ann Arbor, Mich., part of Grey Advertising, is acquiring its first agency in Europe, Media 21 in London, which specializes in online media planning and buying. The financial terms of the deal were not disclosed.
Media 21 has 20 employees and handles media services for accounts with billings estimated at $5 million from clients like VNU and Virgin.net.

Beyond Interactive in Ann Arbor, Mich., part of Grey Advertising, is acquiring its first agency in Europe, Media 21 in London, which specializes in online media planning and buying. The financial terms of the deal were not disclosed.
Media 21 has 20 employees and handles media services for accounts with billings estimated at $5 million from clients like VNU and Virgin.net.

The agency will become a London office for Beyond Interactive where Rick Sareen, 45, partner at Media 21, becomes chairman. Beyond Interactive opened offices last month in China, Hong Kong and Mexico City. Grey is being reorganized as the Grey Global Group.
